page.title: 18STAR PRIMARY SCHOOL (cont.)
page.content: At the moment, there are 44 pupils-21 in P1-3 and 23 in P4-7. There are two permanent teachers, one supply, one auxillary and one Janitor, who make up the staff of the school. The money for building this school came from Alexander Bell who also built {Madras {College in St Andrews.}In his Will he left instructions for some of his money to be used to set up schools in rural areas. Star School was one of these. {TRANSPORT} --------- There are 2 buses which go out of Star in the morning. Those buses take the Secondary pupils to Auchmuty High School, Glenrothes and take shoppers to Markinch or Glenrothes. Star has only one shop, The Post Office. One bus goes through th village early in the evening.
